title: Network Protocols and Applications
description:
This advanced networking module aims to equip students with the basics and
theories of Internet-related technologies, which are necessary for computer/network engineers. The topics that will be covered include Internet architecture, Internet applications and their protocols (HTTP, FTP, DNS, Email, P2P, BitTorrent, etc.), wireless and mobile networks, mobility management, multimedia networking, and network security.
prerequisite: EE2012A / ST2334 (for AY2019 intake & after) ; EE2012 / ST2334 (for AY2018 intake & prior)
